data.title: Masters Touch Salon
data.meta_description: Masters Touch Salon is a Christian owned and operated salon that has established itself as a forerunner for cutting edge style, creating some of the latest trends in the industry.
data.text:
About us

Masters Touch Salon is a Christian owned and operated salon that has established itself as a forerunner for cutting edge style, creating some of the latest trends in the industry. We strive to provide a comfortable atmostphere for your beauty services.

Owner

Deya Masters and her family have continuously updated and improved the space and services over the last 16 years to make sure that the salon always offers a best-in-class experience for its customers.

Services

We offer a wide range of services, including precision haircutting, dimensional and corrective color, foil highlighting, as well as waxing and extensions. We also have a barber shop in the salon for the men that want a traditional barbering experience.

Pricing

Barber

Masters Touch Salon also offers in-house barber services in a dedicated barber suite, designed to make the manliest men feel at home despite being in a â€œsalon".
